welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bracknell, a charming town known for its beautiful green spaces, vibrant culture, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to the needs of VIP and executive travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The first terminal to be built at Heathrow, serving mainly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly European and some long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A hub for SkyTeam alliance airlines, serving mainly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The main terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly British Airways and Oneworld alliance flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with a limit of 4 hours per device.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lasham Airport is a modern and efficient facility, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lasham Airport offers exclusive services for private and charter flights, including VIP lounges and concierge services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, simply connect to the network and follow the instructions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Benson Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Benson Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the newer of the two terminals and mainly serves international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the older of the two terminals and mainly serves domestic and European flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
